snippet: Mr. Cramer was a Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter; his book “What It Takes,” about the 1988 presidential election, was considered among the finest ever written about American politics.
abstract: Richard Ben Cramer, celebrated author and Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter, dies at age 62.

byline.contributor: Jennifer M. Preston and Katharine Q. Seelye contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Cramer was a Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter; his book “What It Takes,” about the 1988 presidential election, was considered among the finest ever written about American politics.

headline.seo: Richard Ben Cramer Dies at 62; Chronicled Presidential Politics
headline.main: Richard Ben Cramer Dies at 62; Wrote of Presidential Race
headline.print_headline: Richard Cramer, 62, Wrote of Presidential Race

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: What It Takes: The Way to the White House (Book)
